title: Simulation-Based Large-Scale Online Collaborative Learning for Complex Problem Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Social Science Theory and Digital Literacy
context.additional_context: A collaborative problem-solving process conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments. Requires interdisciplinary approaches to social issues.

learning_goals: Learners can derive core causes and interconnections of real-world social issues with 80% accuracy
Through role division among team members, learners can systematically design complex problem-solving processes in three or more stages
Learners can propose solutions considering diverse stakeholders at a 70%+ feasibility level in a simulation environment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
